content: I'm also thinking about creating a budget for my shopping habits. I've been tracking my expenses, and I realized that I tend to splurge on luxury items. For instance, I invested in a high-quality pair of luxury shoes that cost me $400, and I've been getting a lot of use out of them. However, I want to make sure I'm not overspending in the long run. Do you have any advice on how to create a budget for shopping and stick to it?
